title: (x) 95 Here We Come shirt fonts - Modern No. 20, Helvetica Comp {Patricia}
content:
Trying to figure out some old fonts to recreate some shirt designs.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [01-02 back logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121095522/http:/typophile.com/files/01-02%20back%20logo.jpg) | 246.77 KB |

author: Jeremy9107

comments.content:
HERE WE COME looks like Modern No. 20

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/modern-no-20/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071121095522/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/modern-no-20/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/modern-no-20/")
